properties.displayName: Advanced Multistage Attack Detection
properties.description:
Microsoft Sentinel uses Fusion, a correlation engine based on scalable machine learning algorithms, to automatically detect multistage attacks by identifying combinations of anomalous behaviors and suspicious activities that are observed at various stages of the kill chain. On the basis of these discoveries, Azure Sentinel generates incidents that would otherwise be very difficult to catch. By design, these incidents are low-volume, high-fidelity, and high-severity, which is why this detection is turned ON by default.

Since Fusion correlates multiple signals from various products to detect advanced multistage attacks, successful Fusion detections are presented as Fusion incidents on the Microsoft Sentinel Incidents page. This rule covers the following detections:
- Fusion for emerging threats
- Fusion for ransomware
- Scenario-based Fusion detections (122 scenarios)

To enable these detections, we recommend you configure the following data connectors for best results:
- Out-of-the-box anomaly detections
- Azure Active Directory Identity Protection
- Azure Defender
- Azure Defender for IoT
- Microsoft 365 Defender
- Microsoft Cloud App Security    
- Microsoft Defender for Endpoint
- Microsoft Defender for Identity
- Microsoft Defender for Office 365
- Scheduled analytics rules, both built-in and those created by your security analysts. Analytics rules must contain kill-chain (tactics) and entity mapping information in order to be used by Fusion.

For the full description of each detection that is supported by Fusion, go to https://aka.ms/SentinelFusion.

properties.query:
let time_ago = 1d;
let Mango = view () {
	workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").OfficeActivity
	| where TimeGenerated > ago(time_ago)
	| where RecordType == "MicrosoftTeams" and Operation == "MemberAdded" 
	| where UserType == "Regular" and UserId contains "ext"
	| project TimeAdded=TimeGenerated, UserId, Operation, ItemName
	| join (
	workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").OfficeActivity
	| where TimeGenerated > ago(time_ago)
	| where RecordType == "MicrosoftTeams" and Operation == "MemberRemoved" 
	| where UserType == "Regular" and UserId contains "ext"
	| project TimeDeleted=TimeGenerated, Operation, UserId, ItemName) on UserId, ItemName
	| project TimeAdded, TimeDeleted, UserId, ItemName
	| extend timestamp = TimeAdded
};
union withsource="TenantDetection"  Mango

properties.query:
let starttime = 14d;
let endtime = 8h;
let Mango = view () {
    let historicalActivity =
        workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SigninLogs
        | where TimeGenerated between(ago(starttime) .. ago(endtime)) and ResultType == 0
        | extend locationString = tostring(LocationDetails["state"]) |where isnotempty(locationString)
        | project TimeGenerated, AppDisplayName, UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, locationString;
    let recentActivity = 
        workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SigninLogs
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(endtime) and ResultType == 0
        | extend locationString = tostring(LocationDetails["state"]) |where isnotempty(locationString)
        | project TimeGenerated, AppDisplayName, UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, locationString;
    let RareLocation = recentActivity
        | join kind= leftanti (historicalActivity) on locationString;
    workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated >= ago(endtime)
        and ResultType == 0
        and Identity !contains "Tienda" 
    | extend locationString = tostring(LocationDetails["state"]) |where isnotempty(locationString)
    | join kind= inner (RareLocation) on IPAddress
    | summarize
        by
        IPAddress,
        Identity,
        UserId,
        locationString,
        TimeGenerated,
        OperationName,
        ResultType,
        ResultDescription
    | order by IPAddress asc, UserId asc
    | extend AccountCustomEntity = Identity
    | extend IPCustomEntity = IPAddress |where isnotempty(locationString)
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IPAddress
};
union withsource="TenantDetection"  Mango

properties.query:
let Mango = view () {
workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SigninLogs 
    | where ResultType !in ("50125","50089","50173","500121","50097","70044","50155","50074","50140","50076")
    |summarize make_list(ResultType) by UserPrincipalName
    |extend list_attempts = tostring(list_ResultType)
    |extend list_attempts=replace_string(list_attempts,'","',' ')
    |extend list_attempts=replace_string(list_attempts,'["','')
    |extend list_attempts=replace_string(list_attempts,'"]','')
    |where list_attempts matches regex @"(\d{2,}\s){50,}0+"
    | project UserPrincipalName,list_attempts 
};
union withsource="TenantDetection"  Mango

properties.query:
let timeframe = 10m;
let threshold = 40;let Mango = view () {
workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SecurityEvent 
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeframe)
| where EventID == 4625 and LogonType !in (3,4,5)
| where AccountType =~ "User"
| summarize min(TimeGenerated), max(TimeGenerated), FailedLogonCount = count() by EventID, Activity, WorkstationName, Account, 
TargetAccount, TargetUserName, TargetDomainName, LogonType, LogonTypeName, LogonProcessName, Status, SubStatus
| where FailedLogonCount >= threshold
| project StartTimeUtc = min_TimeGenerated, EndTimeUtc = max_TimeGenerated, FailedLogonCount, EventID, Activity, WorkstationName, 
Account, TargetAccount, TargetUserName, TargetDomainName, LogonType, LogonTypeName, LogonProcessName, Status, SubStatus
| extend timestamp = StartTimeUtc, AccountCustomEntity = Account, HostCustomEntity = WorkstationName
};
union withsource="TenantDetection"  Mango

properties.displayName: UC051691 - Group creation by unauthorized user

properties.displayName: UC051692 - Failed login from well-known port
properties.description: Detects any failed login (Event ID 4625) from a well-known port (greater than 0 and less than 1024). Those ports should be system reserved and are not expected to be used to log in.

properties.displayName: UC051693 - Sucessful login from well-known port
properties.description: Detects any successful login (Event ID 4624) from a well-known port (greater than 0 and less than 1024). Those ports should be system reserved and are not expected to be used to log in.

properties.displayName: UC051694 - TGS request from well-known port
properties.description: Detects any failed kerberos authentication request (Event ID 4769) from a well-known port (greater than 0 and less than 1024). Those ports should be system reserved and are not expected to be used to log in.

properties.displayName: UC051695 - Pre-authentication failed from well-known port
properties.description: Detects any failed kerberos pre-authentication (Event ID 4771) from a well-known port (greater than 0 and less than 1024). Those ports should be system reserved and are not expected to be used to log in.

properties.displayName: UC051696 - TGT request from well-known port
properties.description: Detects any failed kerberos authentication request (Event ID 4768) from a well-known port (greater than 0 and less than 1024). Those ports should be system reserved and are not expected to be used to log in.

properties.displayName: UC051697 - Policy audit changed
properties.description: Detects that a computer's system level audit policy was modified (Event ID 4719).

properties.displayName: UC051698 - Restricted process name
properties.description: Detects failed logins (Event ID 4625) where a process contains a restricted set of words (e.g, mimikatz or cain.exe) taken from a blacklist.

properties.displayName: UC051686 - User pre-authentication failed error increase VIP
properties.description: Detects kerberos pre-authentication failure (Event ID 4771) from users who does belong to the VIP list and the user account does not have revoked credentials, does not have any change to the account, the account is not locked out and has a correct login (Event ID 4624).

properties.displayName: UC051687 - User pre-authentication failed error increase
properties.description: Detects kerberos pre-authentication failure (Event ID 4771) from users who does not belong to the VIP list and the user account does not have revoked credentials, does not have any change to the account, the account is not locked out and has a correct login (Event ID 4624).

properties.query:
let Mango = view () {   
	workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").OfficeActivity
	| where Operation == "Add-MailboxPermission" and UserType != "DcAdmin"
	| extend SubjectUser = UserId
	| extend isnotnull(Parameters)
	| extend TargetUser = parse_json(parse_json(Parameters)[1]).Value 
	| extend Mailbox = parse_json(parse_json(Parameters)[0]).Value
	| extend AccessRights = parse_json(parse_json(Parameters)[2]).Value
	| where AccessRights != "FullAccess"
};
union withsource="TenantDetection"  Mango

properties.query:
let Mango = view () {   
	workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").OfficeActivity
    | where Operation == "Add-MailboxPermission" and UserType != "DcAdmin"
  	| extend SubjectUser = UserId
    | extend TargetUser = parse_json(parse_json(Parameters)[1]).Value 
    | extend Mailbox = parse_json(parse_json(Parameters)[0]).Value
    | extend AccessRights = parse_json(parse_json(Parameters)[2]).Value
    | summarize NumGrantedPermissions = dcount(tostring(TargetUser)), UsersGrantedPermissions = make_set(tostring(TargetUser)) by SubjectUser, tostring(Mailbox)
   	| where NumGrantedPermissions >= 5
};

properties.query:
let Mango = view () {
    let ExclusionList = Mango_UC080507_exclusion_users
        | project SubjectUser;
    workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").OfficeActivity
    | where Operation == "Add-MailboxPermission" and UserType != "DcAdmin"
    | extend SubjectUser = UserId
    | extend isnotnull(Parameters)
    | extend TargetUser = parse_json(parse_json(Parameters)[1]).Value 
    | extend Mailbox = parse_json(parse_json(Parameters)[0]).Value
    | extend AccessRights = parse_json(parse_json(Parameters)[2]).Value
    | where AccessRights == "FullAccess"	
    | where SubjectUser !in (ExclusionList)
};
union withsource="TenantDetection"  Mango

properties.query:
let starttime = ago(1h);
let endtime = now();
let lookback = starttime - 7d;
let Mango = view () {
    workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").CylancePROTECT
    | where TimeGenerated between(lookback..starttime)
    | where EventType == "ExploitAttempt" and EventName == "blocked"
    | parse SyslogMessage with *"Action:" ExploitAction ","*
    | parse SyslogMessage with *"Process Name: " ExploitProcessName ","*
    | parse SyslogMessage with *"User Name: " ExploitUserName ","*
    | parse SyslogMessage with *"Violation Type: " ExploitViolationType ","*
    | summarize alerts_last_week = count() by EventType, ExploitProcessName, DeviceName, ExploitUserName, ExploitViolationType
    | join kind=inner (
    workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").CylancePROTECT
    | where TimeGenerated between(starttime..endtime)
    | where EventType == "ExploitAttempt" and EventName == "blocked"
    | parse SyslogMessage with *"Action:" ExploitAction ","*
    | parse SyslogMessage with *"Process Name: " ExploitProcessName ","*
    | parse SyslogMessage with *"User Name: " ExploitUserName ","*
    | parse SyslogMessage with *"Violation Type: " ExploitViolationType ","*
    | summarize alerts_today = count() by EventType, ExploitProcessName, DeviceName, ExploitUserName, ExploitViolationType
    ) on ExploitProcessName, DeviceName
    | summarize by EventType, ExploitProcessName, DeviceName, ExploitUserName, ExploitViolationType, alerts_last_week, alerts_today
    | where alerts_last_week + alerts_today >= 10
};
union withsource="TenantDetection"  Mango

properties.query:
let Mango = view () {
    workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SecurityEvent
    | where EventID == 4769
    | parse EventData with *'IpAddress">' IpAddress '<'*
    | where IpAddress != "-" and isnotnull(IpAddress) and isnotempty(IpAddress)
    | parse EventData with *'Status">' Status '<'*
    | where Status =~ "0x6"
    | parse EventData with *'TargetUserName">' TargetUserName '<'*
    | where TargetUserName != "-" and isnotnull(TargetUserName) and isnotempty(TargetUserName)
    | summarize Count = count() by IpAddress, TargetUserName
    | summarize DistinctTargetedAccounts = count() by SourceIpAddress = IpAddress
    | where DistinctTargetedAccounts >= 10
};
union withsource="TenantDetection" Mango
properties.displayName: UC050144 - ST Possible user enumeration
properties.description: Detects multiple kerberos ST (Service Ticket) requests of different users from the same IP with an incorrect or bad user name (non-existent) on several repeated occasions (Event ID 4769, Status 0x6).

properties.query:
let Mango = view () {
    let SourceIPExclusion = MANGO_UC050145_exclusion_SourceIP | project SourceIP;
    workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SecurityEvent
    | where EventID == 4768
    | parse EventData with *'IpAddress">' IpAddress '<'*
    | where IpAddress != "-" and isnotnull(IpAddress) and isnotempty(IpAddress)
    | parse EventData with *'Status">' Status '<'*
    | where Status =~ "0x6"
    | parse EventData with *'TargetUserName">' TargetUserName '<'*
    | where TargetUserName != "-" and isnotnull(TargetUserName) and isnotempty(TargetUserName)
    | where IpAddress !in (SourceIPExclusion)
    | summarize Count = count() by IpAddress, TargetUserName
    | summarize DistinctTargetedAccounts = count() by SourceIpAddress = IpAddress
    | where DistinctTargetedAccounts >= 10
};
union withsource="TenantDetection" Mango
properties.displayName: UC050145 - TGT Possible user enumeration
properties.description: Detects multiple kerberos TGT requests of different users from the same IP with an incorrect or bad user name (non-existent) on several repeated occasions (Event ID 4768, Status 0x6).

properties.query:
let Mango = view () {
	workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").CommonSecurityLog
	| where DeviceVendor == "Trend Micro"
	| where Activity == "Offline"
	| parse AdditionalExtensions with "target=" computer ";"*
	| parse Message with *"since " OfflineDate ". The Agent"*
	| parse OfflineDate with month " " day ", " year " "hour
	| extend month = iff(month=='January',1,iff(month=='February',2,iff(month=='March',3,iff(month=='April',4,iff(month=='May',5,iff(month=='June',6,iff(month=='July',7,iff(month=='August',8,iff(month=='September',9,iff(month=='October',10,iff(month=='November',11,iff(month=='December',12,0))))))))))))
	| extend OfflineDate = strcat(year,"-",month,"-",day," ",hour)
	| extend DaysOffline = datetime_diff('day',now(),todatetime(OfflineDate))
	| where DaysOffline > 6
	| summarize by computer,DaysOffline
};
union withsource="TenantDetection" Mango

properties.query:
union isfuzzy=true 
(
 SecurityEvent
 | where EventID == 4738
 | where SubjectAccount !contains "usat"
 // 2089 value indicates the Don't Expire Password value has been set
 | where UserAccountControl has "%%2089" 
 | extend Value_2089 = iff(UserAccountControl has "%%2089","'Don't Expire Password' - Enabled", "Not Changed")
 // 2050 indicates that the Password Not Required value is NOT set, this often shows up at the same time as a 2089 and is the recommended value.  This value may not be in the event. 
 | extend Value_2050 = iff(UserAccountControl has "%%2050","'Password Not Required' - Disabled", "Not Changed")
 // If value %%2082 is present in the 4738 event, this indicates the account has been configured to logon WITHOUT a password. Generally you should only see this value when an account is created and only in Event 4720: Account Creation Event.  
 | extend Value_2082 = iff(UserAccountControl has "%%2082","'Password Not Required' - Enabled", "Not Changed")
 | project StartTime = TimeGenerated, EventID, Activity, Computer, TargetAccount, TargetSid, AccountType, UserAccountControl, Value_2089, Value_2050, Value_2082, SubjectAccount
 | extend timestamp = StartTime, AccountCustomEntity = TargetAccount, HostCustomEntity = Computer
 ),
 (
 WindowsEvent
 | where EventID == 4738 and EventData has '2089'
 // 2089 value indicates the Don't Expire Password value has been set
 | extend UserAccountControl = tostring(EventData.UserAccountControl)
 | where UserAccountControl has "%%2089" 
 | extend Value_2089 = iff(UserAccountControl has "%%2089","'Don't Expire Password' - Enabled", "Not Changed")
 // 2050 indicates that the Password Not Required value is NOT set, this often shows up at the same time as a 2089 and is the recommended value.  This value may not be in the event. 
 | extend Value_2050 = iff(UserAccountControl has "%%2050","'Password Not Required' - Disabled", "Not Changed")
 // If value %%2082 is present in the 4738 event, this indicates the account has been configured to logon WITHOUT a password. Generally you should only see this value when an account is created and only in Event 4720: Account Creation Event.  
 | extend Value_2082 = iff(UserAccountControl has "%%2082","'Password Not Required' - Enabled", "Not Changed")
 | extend Activity="4738 - A user account was changed."
 | extend TargetAccount = strcat(EventData.TargetDomainName,"\\", EventData.TargetUserName)
 | extend TargetSid = tostring(EventData.TargetSid)
 | extend SubjectAccount = strcat(EventData.SubjectDomainName,"\\", EventData.SubjectUserName)
 | extend SubjectUserSid = tostring(EventData.SubjectUserSid)
 | extend AccountType=case(SubjectAccount endswith "$" or SubjectUserSid in ("S-1-5-18", "S-1-5-19", "S-1-5-20"), "Machine", isempty(SubjectUserSid), "", "User")
 | project StartTime = TimeGenerated, EventID, Activity, Computer, TargetAccount, TargetSid, AccountType, UserAccountControl, Value_2089, Value_2050, Value_2082, SubjectAccount
 | extend timestamp = StartTime, AccountCustomEntity = TargetAccount, HostCustomEntity = Computer
 )
properties.displayName: AD account with Don't Expire Password
properties.description:
Identifies whenever a user account has the setting "Password Never Expires" in the user account properties selected.
This is indicated in Security event 4738 in the EventData item labeled UserAccountControl with an included value of %%2089.
%%2089 resolves to "Don't Expire Password - Enabled".

properties.query:
let logonDiff = 5s;
let Mango = view () {
let aadSignin = 
workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SigninLogs
| where ResultType == "0" 
| where AppDisplayName !in ("Office 365 Exchange Online", "Skype for Business Online")
| project SuccessLogonTime = TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, SuccessIPAddress = IPAddress, AppDisplayName, SuccessIPBlock = strcat(split(IPAddress, ".")[0], ".", split(IPAddress, ".")[1]), Type
| join kind= inner (
    workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SigninLogs
    | where ResultType !in ("0", "50140") 
    | where ResultDescription !~ "Other"  
    | where AppDisplayName !in ("Office 365 Exchange Online", "Skype for Business Online")
    | project FailedLogonTime = TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, FailedIPAddress = IPAddress, AppDisplayName, ResultType, ResultDescription, Type
) on UserPrincipalName, AppDisplayName 
| where SuccessLogonTime < FailedLogonTime and FailedLogonTime - SuccessLogonTime <= logonDiff and FailedIPAddress !startswith SuccessIPBlock
| summarize FailedLogonTime = max(FailedLogonTime), SuccessLogonTime = max(SuccessLogonTime) by UserPrincipalName, SuccessIPAddress, AppDisplayName, FailedIPAddress, ResultType, ResultDescription, Type
| extend timestamp = SuccessLogonTime;
let aadNonInt = 
workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
| where ResultType == "0" 
| where AppDisplayName !in ("Office 365 Exchange Online", "Skype for Business Online")
| project SuccessLogonTime = TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, SuccessIPAddress = IPAddress, AppDisplayName, SuccessIPBlock = strcat(split(IPAddress, ".")[0], ".", split(IPAddress, ".")[1]), Type
| join kind= inner (
    workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where ResultType !in ("0", "50140") 
    | where ResultDescription !~ "Other"  
    | where AppDisplayName !in ("Office 365 Exchange Online", "Skype for Business Online")
    | project FailedLogonTime = TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, FailedIPAddress = IPAddress, AppDisplayName, ResultType, ResultDescription, Type
) on UserPrincipalName, AppDisplayName 
| where SuccessLogonTime < FailedLogonTime and FailedLogonTime - SuccessLogonTime <= logonDiff and FailedIPAddress !startswith SuccessIPBlock
| summarize FailedLogonTime = max(FailedLogonTime), SuccessLogonTime = max(SuccessLogonTime) by UserPrincipalName, SuccessIPAddress, AppDisplayName, FailedIPAddress, ResultType, ResultDescription, Type
| extend timestamp = SuccessLogonTime;
union isfuzzy=true aadSignin, aadNonInt
};
union withsource="TenantDetection" Mango
properties.displayName: UCMA050202 - Successful logon from IP and failure from a different IP
properties.description:
Identifies when a user account successfully logs onto an Azure App from one IP and within 5 seconds failed to logon to the same App via a different IP.
This may indicate a malicious attempt at password guessing based on knowledge of the users account.

properties.query:
let Mango = view () {
workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SecurityEvent 
| where (EventID == 307)
| extend EventDataString = tostring(EventData)
|extend user = extract_all("<Data>(.*?)</Data>", EventDataString) 
| where user[2] != "MNG\\MS_Tareas"}; 
union withsource="TenantDetection"  Mango
properties.displayName: UC070140 - ADFS Trust Modification Detection
UC070141 - Password Change in AD FS
UC070142 - Multiple Password Change Request Error
UC050249 - Credential Validation Success

properties.query:
let Mango = view () {
    workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SecurityEvent
    | where EventID == 1203
    | extend d=parse_xml(EventData)
    | extend resul = tostring(d.EventData.Data[1])
    | extend ip = tostring(d.EventData.Data[4])
    | extend user = extract_all("<UserId>(.*?)<", resul)[0]
    | summarize count() by tostring(user) 
    | where count_ >= 1000
}; 
union withsource="TenantDetection"  Mango
properties.displayName: UC050250 - Credential Validation Error
UC050251 - Token validation failed
UC050252 - Token validation Success
UC070143 - Wmi Configuration Change Success

properties.query:
let Mango = view () {
    workspace("4d082081-7c2a-4f57-b848-bd64e5c72859").SecurityEvent
    | where EventID in ("1210")
    | extend d=parse_xml(EventData)
    | extend resul = tostring(d.EventData.Data[1])
    | extend ip = extract_all("<IpAddress>(.*?)<", resul)[0]
    | extend userId = extract_all("<UserId>(.*?)<", resul)[0]
    | extend CurrentBadPasswordCount = extract_all("<CurrentBadPasswordCount>(.*?)<", resul)[0]
    | extend ConfigBadPasswordCount = extract_all("<ConfigBadPasswordCount>(.*?)<", resul)[0]
    | extend Endpoint = extract_all("<Endpoint>(.*?)<", resul)[0]
    | where CurrentBadPasswordCount >= 2000
    | where not (ip == "192.168.16.5")
}; 
union withsource="TenantDetection"  Mango
